value.name: British police officers accuse government of using them as ‘PR pawns’
value.description: A group representing police officers on Tuesday attacked the UK government for using its members as “public relations pawns” after the prime minister and home secretary visited Surrey Police to publicise a package of contentious anti-crime measures.

value.name: West Virginia city makes final pitch in opioid lawsuit seeking $2.5 bln
